TopicTitle: Mechjeb Returns... - Trailer - A KSP Action Movie!

Articles.Content:
Thought since my last one M.I.A Was a bit boring, I'd start with something awesome!
Also i forgot to add music, So youtube is adding some as i type!

The grammar is off, the scenes drag on too long, and the text effects are eh. It has potential, but I'd like to see it worked on by several people with proper software. Also, the graphics settings are way too low.

The grammar is off, the scenes drag on too long, and the text effects are eh. It has potential, but I'd like to see it worked on by several people with proper software. Also, the graphics settings are way too low.

Sorry about that, And thanks for constructive critiscm. I was using my badder editing software because i was rendering something else ( A special project ) on my good editing software (Vegas Pro 12) Also i did skip the scenes that we're boring, But yeah.

I'm glad you saw it had potential and hopefully you'll watch the new one, It'll be a better one the real movie will, not the trailer.

It's is going to destroy us all. What are we going to do?

Our defenses are broken. We have no other choice.

You don't mean--

Yes. We must launch 0.23.5. It's the only thing that can stop Mechjeb now.

It's is going to destroy us all. What are we going to do?

Our defenses are broken. We have no other choice.

Yes. We must launch 0.23.5. It's the only thing that can stop Mechjeb now.

Hahahaha! Nice one! I just use mechjeb so i can use EnterElysium's MJ Fighters. (He gave them out on reddit aswell as his savegames with his missions he did on world war K 2)

So yeah haha.

I just use it for the readouts because I like them a lot more than the stock instruments. Though I'm not one who takes issue with people who use the autopilot.
I don't know how I feel about this...
It's... better. It's better, SuperWeeGee makes valid points. If you game lags at higher settings, try the phsyics delta time slider in the settings, like I told you last time.

It's... better. It's better, SuperWeeGee makes valid points. If you game lags at higher settings, try the phsyics delta time slider in the settings, like I told you last time.

Alrighty, with ACTIVE TEXTURE MANAGEMENT and Physics Delta Time thingy, I have higher settings and 0 percent lag. Expect better visuals when the *REAL* thing comes out, Not the trailer hehe.
